amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 115-679 to ensure that newly designated 1890 Institution's base funding is calculated by using the same formula as already established 1890 Institutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Turner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
